channel.title: Whats wrong?
channel.description:
Why wom't my compiler work?????
[code]javac: file not found: ..\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options - - - - - - Complie Complete. - - - - - -
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
this is my complier
@echo off title Compiler color 0a "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" ../*.java echo - - - - - - Complie Complete. - - - - - - echo. echo. pause

item.title: Whats wrong?
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

teh war of noobs:

go to java.sun.com and get the newest java, once you have it edit your compiler and where it says jdk1.6.0_11, than change the 11 to 17

Read the error

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong?
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Use this:

@echo off
title Compiler
color 0a
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" ./*.java
echo - - - - - - Complie Complete. - - - - - -
echo.
echo.
pause

Make sure the compiler is in the same directory as the Java source files.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong?
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

Why wom’t my compiler work???

[code]javac: file not found: …*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options

            • Complie Complete. - - - - - -

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

this is my complier

@echo off
title Compiler
color 0a
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe” …/*.java
echo - - - - - - Complie Complete. - - - - - -
echo.
echo.
pause
